content: The SMART Health Cards Dev Tools, formerly known as the validation SDK, has been updated to version 1.0.2-0, following the latest spec version update. It also includes recent code and feature updates. Everyone is encouraged to get the new version.
Another update of the SHC dev tools was released today, v.1.2.0-0, adding support for SHC revocation.
Another update of the SHC dev tools was released today, v.1.2.1-0, adding support for SHC expiration.
Another update of the SHC dev tools was released today, v.1.2.1-1, adding the ability to use the HL7 FHIR validator directly from the tool.
